00007 string YardPackageType::ToString(const string& delim) const {
00008     
00009     stringstream output;
00010     char q = '\'';
00011     output << GetId() << delim 
00012         <<  << delim << m_custAcctNum 
00013         << delim << m_carrierID << delim << m_trackNum 
00014         << delim << m_shippingType;
00015     
00016     return output.str();
00017         
00018 }

00068 /*
00069 DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Package_Table;
00070 
00071 CREATE TABLE Package_Table(
00072     PKG_ID_Number               INT AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
00073     PKG_REF_TRANS_ID            INT,
00074     PKG_REF_CUST_Account_Number     INT,
00075     PKG_REF_CRR_ID_Number           INT,
00076     PKG_Tracking_Number         varchar(50),
00077     PKG_REF_SHP_Shipping_Type       varchar(30),
00078     Primary Key(PKG_ID_Number),
00079     INDEX trans_id (PKG_REF_TRANS_ID),
00080     INDEX cust_acct (PKG_REF_CUST_Account_Number),
00081     INDEX crr_id (PKG_REF_CRR_ID_number),
00082     INDEX shp_type (PKG_REF_SHP_Shipping_Type),
00083     FOREIGN KEY (PKG_REF_TRANS_ID) REFERENCES Transaction_Log_Table( TRANS_ID ),
00084     FOREIGN KEY (PKG_REF_CUST_Account_Number) REFERENCES Customer_Table( CUST_Account_Number ),
00085     FOREIGN KEY (PKG_REF_CRR_ID_Number) REFERENCES Carrier_Table( CRR_ID ),
00086     FOREIGN KEY (PKG_REF_SHP_Shipping_Type) REFERENCES Shipping_Table( SHP_Type )
00087 ) type=InnoDB
00088 */
